graveGlory.name: Grave (Takes all movement points, and gives 500-5000 gold, a random Treasure of Minor artifact, and -3 morale until the next battle.)

rewards.message:
{Grave}

This tomb is fresh, and even the shovel someone dug it with hasn't been stolen yet. You take up the latter, cover your nose with a handkerchief, and manage to extract something valuable from the ground.
